name.en-US: en-US Black Baby Short Sleeve Bodysuit with White Logo
name.en: Black Baby Short Sleeve Bodysuit with White Logo
name.it: Body nero a maniche corte per bebè con logo bianco

description.en-US: en-US This comfortable baby one-piece is made of 100% combed ring-spun cotton except for heather grey color, which contains polyester. The lap shoulders ensure that the bodysuit can be easily put on and taken off, making for easy changing.
description.en: This comfortable baby one-piece is made of 100% combed ring-spun cotton except for heather grey color, which contains polyester. The lap shoulders ensure that the bodysuit can be easily put on and taken off, making for easy changing.

name.en: White Water Bottle with Black Logo (17oz)
name.it: Bottiglia d'acqua bianca con logo nero (510ml)

description.en: Beautifully designed water bottle, made from high-grade stainless steel. Its double-wall construction makes it perfect for storing both hot and cold liquids.
description.it: Beautifully designed water bottle, made from high-grade stainless steel. Its double-wall construction makes it perfect for storing both hot and cold liquids.

name.en: Black Cuffed Beanie with White Logo
name.it: Berretto con risvolto nero con logo bianco

description.en: A snug, form-fitting beanie. It's not only a great head-warming piece but a staple accessory in anyone's wardrobe.
